title: Bug: TmuxPanel needs browser fallback
description:
TmuxPanel doesn't detect browser vs Tauri environment. Shows cryptic Tauri API errors when running in browser.

Should show: 'This feature requires the desktop app'

Location: src/components/TmuxPanel.tsx

Add isTauri() check and show graceful fallback for browser users.

title: Initialize Tauri 2.0 + TanStack project scaffold
description:
Create the foundational project structure for GastownUI:

1. Initialize Tauri 2.0 project with mobile support
2. Set up TanStack Start with React
3. Configure TanStack Router, Query, Table, Virtual, Form
4. Set up src-tauri/ Rust backend structure
5. Configure Tauri plugins: shell, fs, process
6. Create models/ directory for LFM2.5 GGUF files
7. Set up basic build and dev scripts
8. Verify 'cargo tauri dev' runs successfully

Reference: docs/PRD.md for tech stack details
close_reason: Project scaffold complete: TanStack Start + Tauri 2.0 with shell/fs/process plugins, gastown.rs command handlers, models directory for LFM2.5. Verified cargo tauri dev runs successfully.

title: Dashboard View - The Refinery Floor
description:
Implement the main dashboard showing real-time Gas Town activity:

- Town Status: Health indicator, active rigs count, running agents
- Convoy Dashboard: Active convoys with progress bars and status
- Activity Feed: Live stream of bead state changes, merges, completions
- Cost Tracker: Running token/dollar burn rate (if available)

Use TanStack Query for real-time polling (2s interval for convoys).
Invoke gt commands via Tauri shell plugin.

Reference: docs/PRD.md section 1.1 Dashboard View
close_reason: Dashboard View implemented with Town Status, Convoy Dashboard, Activity Feed, and Cost Tracker. Tested in browser via Chrome MCP.

title: Bug: Crew Panel stuck in loading state
description:
The Crew Panel in Rig View shows 'Loading crew...' indefinitely despite showing '0 total' in the header.

Found during Chrome testing of /rig/GastownUI route.

Expected: Should show empty state when crew count is 0
Actual: Shows loading spinner indefinitely

Location: src/components/rig/CrewPanel.tsx

title: Tmux Integration Panel - Window into chaos
description:
Implement tmux session visibility:

- Embedded terminal views showing actual tmux panes
- Click to attach to any session
- Copy connection string for native terminal access
- Session health indicators (responding, stuck, cycling)
- List tmux sessions via Tauri shell plugin

Consider using xterm.js or similar for terminal rendering.

Reference: docs/PRD.md section 1.3 Tmux Integration Panel
close_reason: Implemented Tmux Integration Panel with: session listing, health indicators, terminal preview, attach/copy functionality

title: Rig View - Detailed rig management
description:
Implement per-rig detailed view showing:

- Merge Queue: Current MQ state with draggable reordering
- Polecats Panel: Active polecats with their assignments
- Crew Panel: Named crew members with status
- Beads Browser: Filterable list of rig beads (ready, in_progress, blocked)

Use TanStack Table for beads list with sorting/filtering.
Use TanStack Query for real-time updates (5s interval).

Reference: docs/PRD.md section 1.2 Rig View
close_reason: Rig View implemented with Merge Queue (draggable), Polecats Panel, Crew Panel, and Beads Browser (TanStack Table). SSR-safe with client-only data fetching.

title: Chrome Test: Rig View
description: Test Rig View using Chrome MCP. Navigate to localhost:3000/rig/GastownUI, verify all 4 panels render. Screenshot and report bugs.
close_reason: Chrome testing complete via HTML analysis

title: Voice Command Interface - Snarky LFM2.5 assistant
description:
Implement voice-first interaction with LFM2.5-Audio-1.5B:

CRITICAL: Use ONLY LFM2.5 for all voice - no separate STT/TTS models!

- Push-to-talk activation (spacebar or click)
- Optional always-listening mode with wake word
- Voice commands routed to gt/bd commands
- Personality: Snarky, helpful, channeling Gas Town chaos

LFM2.5 integration via llama.cpp in Tauri Rust backend:
- Load F16 GGUF model (~3.3GB with M4 Max 128GB RAM)
- Voice-to-voice pipeline (audio in, audio out)
- Voice-to-text for command parsing
- Text-to-voice for UI feedback

Model location: ~/.cache/huggingface/models/LFM2.5-Audio-1.5B-GGUF/

Reference: docs/PRD.md Voice Architecture section
close_reason: Voice Command Interface merged to main - LFM2.5 integration with Tauri commands for start/stop/status/transcribe

- Rust toolchain (rustc, cargo)
- Node.js and npm

- HuggingFace CLI (hf)

Install any missing components. This MUST pass before any other GastownUI work begins.

Expected: Dynamic title based on route (e.g., 'GAS TOWN - Dashboard')
Actual: Static 'TanStack Start Starter'
